title: How to become a better Yasuo player?
body:
I love Yasuo {{champion:157}}  <3 but I can't handle {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  Yasuo {{champion:157}}  in teamfights.
Could you guys give me some tips on how to play Yasuo {{champion:157}}  better?

replies.body: jesus why is everyone so cancerous towards yasuo? just cause you cant beat a champ at higher elos due to him being strong doesnt mean no one needs to play him
Dont take this as a joke, but play someone else. as in, play as other champions, you can still main yasuo, but look into forums for different builds, ruins or masteries. could help slightly

48k mastery on yasuo most summoners who i see starting playing yasuo for the first time (myself included) dont realizing just how much damage your E really does.


On top of that what the lovely Reaper Soraka has said is correct just cause tornado hits doesnt mean time to ult
also paying attention and know who else can knock up like most people dont know rammus,tristana,lee sin,Thresh,and trundle all have ways to set up your ult so playing into your team can be a great way to CC lock the enemy team a good trundle pillar can set up your ult for backline access

I think the hardest part about playing Yasuo is holding back your ham.  Yeah, you hit hard, but sometimes when you land that tornado you just need to walk away instead of ulting off it.

I've never played Yasuo outside of AF1 before, but this is the biggest mistake I see them make.
One can only become more cancerous, on Yasuo.
